name: Co-Void
description:
"Co-Void" is a 2D Management and Type Writer game in which you have to take care of the basic needs of those in quarantine. 

It was developed in a 48 Games Academy Game Jam, April 2020.

Programming - Bernd Gaykowsky
Tech Art, Programming  - Christian Schildhauer
2D Art - Lukas Baumgartner
Game Design, Sound - Franziska Klien

Music:

Fearless First by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3742-fearless-first
